alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:27AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Porter County through 300 AM CDT... At 227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogden Dunes to Crown Point. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portage, Valparaiso, Chesterton, Lakes of the Four Seasons, South Haven, Porter, Burns Harbor, Ogden Dunes, Town of Pines, Beverly Shores, Wheeler, Dune Acres and Malden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
